title: Cannot require ActionMailer railtie after removal of delegation module
body:
Attn: @skipkayhil 

As of https://github.com/rails/rails/commit/1db66c0d4e6398876fbe69b0659d1087f6862e9a loading "action_mailer/railtie" results in a `NoMethodError` being raised

### Steps to reproduce
```shell
bundle exec ruby -r "action_mailer/railtie" -e 'puts "OK"'
```

### Expected behavior

ActionMailer should be loaded

### Actual behavior

```shell
/Users/some-user/Source/open/rails/railties/lib/rails/initializable.rb:41:in '<class:Collection>': undefined method 'delegate_missing_to' for class Rails::Initializable::Collection (NoMethodError)
```
